content.rendered:
Will you help us in building a revolutionary new technology for online broadcasting? Then come and join our enthusiastic team of experienced developers and contribute your knowledge to the development of our products. Tradecast is growing rapidly and therefore we are looking to strengthen our Development team.  

As Backend developer Node JS (AWS Engineer) you will play an important role (and learn a lot!) within an experienced and motivated team of developers. On a daily basis, you will take on part of the operations for our products at AWS. In addition, your days will consist of building intuitive new features and helping realize the new phase of our platform technology.

Job requirements

You have at least 3 years of relevant work experience, of which at least 2 years experience with NodeJS and AWS. Furthermore, you have:

  • Experience with unit/functional/integration testing
  • Experience with GIT
  • Experience with Docker
  • Experience with MySQL
  • Experience with AWS products such as:
    • Lambda
    • API Gateway 
    • Cognito
    • ECS
    • Dynamo DB
    • RDS

Pre’s

  • Experience with Firebase
  • Experience with Elasticsearch

You are

Someone who strives for quality and works accurately. You have an open and flexible attitude and can therefore handle working in a scale-up environment. You are not afraid of responsibilities, you have advisory skills and you like to share your knowledge. You use these talents every day for the best result. Oh, and you shouldn’t be afraid to be part of something big!

Company profile

Tradecast is the world’s first technology that allows you to start your own personalized and interactive online video platform. With Tradecast’s technology, you broadcast your content from one central platform in the cloud, which you control completely. After all, the best return on investment is achieved with data that is truly yours.

What we offer

A dynamic, ‘no-day-is-the-same job’. We are a club with a clear mission to make the difference in the online broadcasting market. This means that we not only make a good product, but we are also pioneering. 

Interested?

Then send your CV to info@tradecast.eu. For questions contact Tobias Ouwerkerk at tobias.ouwerkerk@tradecast.eu or +31 (0)85 201 09 80.
